pgrid.network
Class Challenger

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.network.Challenger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Challenger
extends Object
implements Runnable

This class is responsible for the challenge phase before any secured communication.

Author:
Renault John todo: This class has to be ported to the new architecture of P-Grid
